alert.note: Alert for San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 29 at 8:56PM PDT until May 30 at 3:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands and San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands
